description:
Designed for those who seek the bumps in the night. Multiple light colours preserve stealth and night vision, whether you are stalking an illusive Shrike, devouring a book, or getting up in the night without waking your tent mates. With both spot and flood lighting and up to 450 darkness defying lumens, the Aria 2 RGB is bright enough to be useful almost anywhere.

  • 3 LEDs, 1 focused beam, 1 flood light, and 1 RGB flood light
  • White light mode has 3 different light levels
  • Red, green, and blue lighting can be used as constant light or flashing
  • Red LED preserves night vision and won't disturb tent mates
  • Single button cycles through brightness settings and output colours
  • Light dims gradually, rather than suddenly dimming and going dark
  • IP67 weatherproofing keeps you light shining bright in any weather you're willing to go out in
  • Tilting backplate lets you aim the light up or down, no more flipping it upside down when you need to look up
  • Compatible with CORE rechargeable battery pack and Ni-MH rechargeable batteries (neither included)
  • LED battery indicator lets you know when it’s time to charge or change your batteries
  • Lockout mode prevent accidental activation
name: Petzl Aria 2 RGB 450 Headlamp

specs.value: 3 AAA (included) or rechargeable battery pack (not included)
